caption.p: Effect of silicon addition on the GS activity of G. uralensis under NaCl stress.The different letters within the different treatments indicate the significant difference at P ≤ 0.05 (Si source using K 2SiO 3 as a treatment factor, with amounts of 0, 0.2, 0.4, 0.6 g SiO 2/kg dry soil). The salt treatments are denoted as Na 1, Na 2 and Na 3, while the Si concentrations are denoted as Si 0, Si 1, Si 2 and Si 3).
